ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those are the Ones Brought Near
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They shall be near-stationed (to their Lord),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (The foremost ones) will be the nearest ones to God
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is they who are the close ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: These will be the nearest (to Allah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These are they who are drawn nigh (to Allah),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: those are they brought nigh the Throne,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those are they who will be brought nigh
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They shall be the nearest to God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those! they shall be the brought nigh,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: they are the ones brought near [to Allah],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: These will be those Nearest to Allah:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: These will be those nearest to Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: those are they brought near (to their Lord)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those are the ones brought near [to Allah]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:11] they are the ones brought near [to God],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Those are they who will be brought nigh) to Allah
